game.text: The blockbuster is back! Tetris DS brings the legendary puzzler bang up to date on Nintendo DS with all-new features but still retaining the addictiveness of the original. Tetris DS features not just one mode but six: each themed around a classic Nintendo game such as Mario, Zelda or Metroid. Plus, battle with up to seven friends in local wireless mode or with up to three in worldwide Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection mode.
